title: Portfolio Website

description: Developed a natural language processing model using Python and TensorFlow to classify text documents with 95% accuracy.

description: Built a web scraper using Python and BeautifulSoup to collect and analyze data from multiple sources.

description: Created a cross-platform mobile application using React Native, featuring offline capabilities and push notifications.

description: Conducted comprehensive data analysis using Python and pandas, producing actionable insights for business decisions.
